option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Permissions --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.POST_NOTIFICATIONS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_MEDIA_IMAGES" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.SignupLogInRealtime" android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" tools:targetApi="31"> <activity android:name=".PaymentHistoryActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Activity_adjusting_workout" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ContactUsActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Activity_prepare_easier_plan" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Activity_workout_feedback" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ImageCropActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.NoActionBar" /> <activity android:name=".PayMongoPaymentActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|screenSize|keyboardHidden" android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.NoActionBar" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" /> <activity android:name=".CoachArchiveActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".FeedbackActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Client_workouts_details" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.activity_select_workout_frequency" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".coach_clients" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".activity_workout_complete" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Rest Timer Activity --> <activity android:name=".RestTimerActivity" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Workout Session Activity --> <activity android:name=".WorkoutSessionActivity" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Other activities --> <activity android:name=".Promo" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".WorkoutList" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.HealthIssues" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.FitnessGoal" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.FitnessLevel" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.HeightWeightInput" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.AgeInput" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.GenderSelection" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".SelectMembership" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Notification" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Achievement" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Profile" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".QR" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Splash (Launcher Activity) --> <activity android:name=".SplashActivity" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.SignupLogInRealtime.Splash"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".SignupActivity" android:exported="true" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustPan|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".AboutusActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".StreakCalendar" android:exported="false" /> </application>
</manifest>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <!-- Permissions --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.POST_NOTIFICATIONS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_MEDIA_IMAGES" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.SignupLogInRealtime" android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" tools:targetApi="31"> <activity android:name=".PaymentHistoryActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Activity_adjusting_workout" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ContactUsActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Activity_prepare_easier_plan" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Activity_workout_feedback" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".ImageCropActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.NoActionBar" /> <activity android:name=".PayMongoPaymentActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|screenSize|keyboardHidden" android:theme="@style/Theme.AppCompat.Light.NoActionBar" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" /> <activity android:name=".CoachArchiveActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".FeedbackActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Client_workouts_details" android:exported="false" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.activity_select_workout_frequency" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".coach_clients" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".activity_workout_complete" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Rest Timer Activity --> <activity android:name=".RestTimerActivity" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Workout Session Activity --> <activity android:name=".WorkoutSessionActivity" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Other activities --> <activity android:name=".Promo" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".WorkoutList" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.HealthIssues" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.FitnessGoal" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.FitnessLevel" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.HeightWeightInput" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.AgeInput" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".UserInfo.GenderSelection" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".SelectMembership" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Notification" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Achievement" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".Profile" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".QR" android:exported="false" /> <!-- Splash (Launcher Activity) --> <activity android:name=".SplashActivity" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.SignupLogInRealtime.Splash"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".SignupActivity" android:exported="true" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustPan|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name=".MainActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".AboutusActivity" android:exported="false" /> <activity android:name=".StreakCalendar" android:exported="false" /> </application>
</manifest>

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:id="@+id/main" android:background="@drawable/yellowbackg" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- top Spacing --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="24dp" />
<!-- Header with Back Button --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/back_button" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" android:padding="8dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:text="Client Workout Details" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Client Information Header --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="15dp" android:elevation="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<!-- Client Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/client_name" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:padding="20dp"> android:text="John Doe" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Weight and Height --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:textSize="24sp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" /> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"> android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Weight" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/client_weight" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="75 kg" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="14sp" /> android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:textSize="18sp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Height" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/client_height" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="180 cm" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="14sp" /> android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
android:textSize="18sp" <LinearLayout android:layout_marginTop="4dp" /> android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Goal" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/client_goal" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Weight Loss" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="14sp" /> android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:textSize="18sp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Activity Level" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/workout_frequency" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sedentary" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="14sp" /> android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
android:textSize="18sp"
android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
<!-- PT Sessions Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" android:elevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="15dp" <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="PT Sessions" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:padding="16dp"> android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
android:textSize="18sp" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" /> android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Remaining Sessions:" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/client_remaining_sessions" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="10" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> android:textSize="16sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_mark_session_complete" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mark Session Complete" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white" android:backgroundTint="@color/yellow" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:padding="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView> android:textSize="16sp" <!-- Current Workouts Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:padding="12dp" /> android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Search Trigger Field (placeholder in main content) --> <TextView android:id="@+id/search_trigger" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:hint="︎ Search to add workouts" android:textStyle="italic" android:paddingStart="20dp" <!-- Search Bar --> <EditText android:id="@+id/search_workouts" android:layout_width="350dp" android:focusable="true" />
<!-- Scrollable Section with RecyclerView and Bottom Content --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/workouts_section" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:textColor="@color/black" android:orientation="vertical" android:drawablePadding="12dp" android:inputType="text" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/search_results_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp" android:visibility="gone"/> <!-- Workouts RecyclerView - This will be the scrollable part --> android:orientation="vertical"> android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginHorizontal="8dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" tools:itemCount="4" tools:listitem="@layout/item_editable_exercise" />
<LinearLayout android:id="@+id/empty_workouts_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="32dp" android:visibility="gone">
<ImageView android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_edit" android:alpha="0.5" app:tint="@color/white" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No workouts assigned" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="18sp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Create workouts for this client" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="14sp" android:textAlignment="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:alpha="0.7" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Save Changes Button (Visible only for coach in code) --> <Button android:id="@+id/btn_save_changes" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Save Changes" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white" android:backgroundTint="@color/black" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:padding="12dp" android:visibility="gone"/>
<!-- Bottom Spacing --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="24dp" />
</LinearLayout> <!-- End Main Content -->
<!-- Floating Search Overlay - Appears at top when active --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/search_overlay_container" android:layout_width="match_parent"

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:id="@+id/main" android:background="@drawable/yellowbackg">
<!-- Main Content Container --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/main_content" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- top Spacing --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="24dp" />
<!-- Header with Back Button --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/back_button" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" android:padding="8dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:text="Client Workout Details" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Client Information Header --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" android:elevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<!-- Client Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/client_name" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="John Doe" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Weight and Height --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Weight" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/client_weight" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="75 kg" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Height" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/client_height" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="180 cm" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Goal and activity level --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Goal" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/client_goal" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Weight Loss" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Activity Level" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="12sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/workout_frequency" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Sedentary" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- PT Sessions Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" android:elevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="PT Sessions" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Remaining Sessions:" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/client_remaining_sessions" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="10" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_mark_session_complete" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mark Session Complete" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white" android:backgroundTint="@color/yellow" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:padding="8dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Current Workouts Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Current Workouts" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Search Trigger Field (placeholder in main content) --> <TextView android:id="@+id/search_trigger" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:hint="︎ Search to add workouts" android:textStyle="italic" android:paddingStart="20dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:background="@drawable/search_background" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" />
<!-- Scrollable Section with RecyclerView and Bottom Content --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/workouts_section" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:visibility="visible">
<!-- Workouts RecyclerView - This will be the scrollable part --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/workouts_recycler_view" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginHorizontal="8dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" tools:itemCount="4" tools:listitem="@layout/item_editable_exercise" />
<!-- Empty State for No Workouts --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/empty_workouts_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="32dp" android:visibility="gone">
<ImageView android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_edit" android:alpha="0.5" app:tint="@color/white" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No workouts assigned" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="18sp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Create workouts for this client" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="14sp" android:textAlignment="center" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:alpha="0.7" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Save Changes Button (Visible only for coach in code) --> <Button android:id="@+id/btn_save_changes" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Save Changes" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white" android:backgroundTint="@color/black" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:padding="12dp" android:visibility="gone"/>
<!-- Bottom Spacing --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="24dp" />
</LinearLayout> <!-- End Main Content -->
<!-- Floating Search Overlay - Appears at top when active --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/search_overlay_container" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@drawable/yellowbackg" android:visibility="gone">
<!-- Search Bar with Back Button --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingHorizontal="10dp" android:paddingTop="6dp" android:paddingBottom="6dp" android:background="@drawable/yellowbackg" android:elevation="8dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/search_back_button" android:layout_width="28dp" android:layout_height="28dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" android:padding="2dp" android:layout_marginEnd="6dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/search_workouts" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="34dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="︎ Search to add workouts" android:textStyle="italic" android:textSize="14sp" android:paddingStart="12dp" android:paddingEnd="12dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:textColor="@color/black" android:background="@drawable/search_background" android:inputType="text" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Search Results --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/search_results_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp" android:paddingTop="0dp" android:paddingBottom="8dp" android:clipToPadding="false" android:scrollbars="vertical" />
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
